00063     template <typename MatrixType, typename VectorType>
00064     VectorType solve(const MatrixType & matrix, VectorType const & rhs, cg_tag const & tag)
00065     {
00066       typedef typename VectorType::value_type      ScalarType;
00067       VectorType result(rhs.size());
00068       result.clear();
00069 
00070       VectorType residual = rhs;
00071       VectorType p = rhs;
00072       VectorType tmp(rhs.size());
00073 
00074       ScalarType ip_rr = viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(rhs,rhs);
00075       ScalarType alpha;
00076       ScalarType new_ip_rr;
00077       ScalarType beta;
00078       ScalarType norm_rhs = ip_rr;
00079       
00080       //std::cout << "Starting CG solver... " << std::endl;
00081       
00082       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < tag.iterations(); ++i)
00083       {
00084         tmp = viennacl::linalg::prod(matrix, p);
00085 
00086         alpha = ip_rr / viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(tmp, p);
00087         result += alpha * p;
00088         residual -= alpha * tmp;
00089         
00090         new_ip_rr = viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(residual,residual);
00091         if (new_ip_rr / norm_rhs < tag.tolerance() *  tag.tolerance())    //squared norms involved here
00092           break;
00093         
00094         beta = new_ip_rr / ip_rr;
00095         ip_rr = new_ip_rr;
00096 
00097         p = residual + beta*p;
00098       } 
00099       
00100       return result;
00101     }

00115     template <typename MatrixType, typename VectorType, typename PreconditionerType>
00116     VectorType solve(const MatrixType & matrix, VectorType const & rhs, cg_tag const & tag, PreconditionerType const & precond)
00117     {
00118       typedef typename VectorType::value_type      ScalarType;
00119       typedef typename viennacl::tools::CPU_SCALAR_TYPE_DEDUCER<ScalarType>::ResultType    CPU_ScalarType;
00120       
00121       VectorType result(rhs.size());
00122       result.clear();
00123       
00124       VectorType residual = rhs;
00125       VectorType tmp(rhs.size());
00126       VectorType z = rhs;
00127 
00128       precond.apply(z);
00129       VectorType p = z;
00130 
00131       ScalarType ip_rr = viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(residual, z);
00132       ScalarType alpha;
00133       ScalarType new_ip_rr;
00134       ScalarType beta;
00135       ScalarType norm_rhs = ip_rr;
00136       
00137       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < tag.iterations(); ++i)
00138       {
00139         tmp = viennacl::linalg::prod(matrix, p);
00140         alpha = ip_rr / viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(tmp, p);
00141         result += alpha * p;
00142         residual -= alpha * tmp;
00143         z = residual;
00144         precond.apply(z);
00145         
00146         new_ip_rr = viennacl::linalg::inner_prod(residual, z);
00147         if (std::fabs(new_ip_rr / norm_rhs) < tag.tolerance() *  tag.tolerance())    //squared norms involved here
00148           break;
00149         
00150         beta = new_ip_rr / ip_rr;
00151         ip_rr = new_ip_rr;
00152         p = z + beta*p;
00153       } 
00154       
00155       return result;
00156     }
